com.navis.framework.portal

Interface BizPortalFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BizPortalPea

    public interface BizPortalFacade

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BizResponse processRequest(BizRequest inRequest) 
      void recoverObsoleteEntities(BizRequest inRequest, BizResponse inOutResponse)
      This function is used to recover obsolete entities (basically setting the LifeCycleState to Active).

    • Method Detail

      • processRequest

        BizResponse processRequest(BizRequest inRequest)

      • recoverObsoleteEntities

        void recoverObsoleteEntities(BizRequest inRequest,
                             BizResponse inOutResponse)
                      throws BizViolation
        This function is used to recover obsolete entities (basically setting the LifeCycleState to Active).
        Parameters:
        inRequest: - Requires 2 parameters values to be set (using setParameterValue) 1) ArgoBizMetafields.BASE_ENTITY_GKEYS needs to be set to Serializeable[], an array of primary keys of the entities to be recovered. 2) ArgoBizMetafields.BASE_ENTITY needs to be set to the N4 entity name (String).
        inOutResponse: - contains only the errors
        Throws:
        BizViolation
